public static enum Card.CardValue extends Enum<Card.CardValue>
All possible values of a card.

    • getPointsBig

      public int getPointsBig()
      Retruns bigger value of points, when hand is not losing even with such big values. In particular, it returns 11 for Ace.
      Returns:
      - points

    • getPointsSmall

      public int getPointsSmall()
      Returns smaller value of points used when hand would loose without that downgrade. In particular, it returns 1 for Ace.
      Returns:
      - points
